Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a cloud of crawler blood laced with husk eggs.

Item.name: 500m Airborne Husk Grenade
Item.description: A modified smoke grenade, it emits a cloud of crawler blood laced with husk eggs.

Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.name: 100m Airborne Husk Spawner
Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.name: 40mm Zombie Spore Grenade (5 Minutes)
Item.description: Spreads airborne zombie gas that lasts 5 minutes. ADMIN ONLY.

Item.name: 40mm Zombie Spore Grenade (10 Minutes)
Item.description: Spreads airborne zombie gas that lasts 10 minutes. ADMIN ONLY.

Item.name: Airborne Zombie Emitter (10 Minutes, Wide-Area)
Item.description: Spreads airborne husk for a little over 5 minutes.

Item.name: 40mm Zombie Spore Grenade (Permanent)
Item.description: Spreads airborne zombie gas that lasts FOREVER. ADMIN ONLY. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION.

Item.name: Airborne Zombie Emitter (PERMANENT, Wide-Area)
Item.description: Spreads airborne husk forever.

Item.description: Ambient Frostbite Emitter (25m Range)

Item.description: Ambient Frostbite Emitter (10m Range)

Item.name: Env Cold Water Source (50m)
Item.description: Causes anyone within water to gain Frostbite very rapidly.

Item.description: Causes anyone within water to gain Frostbite very rapidly.

Item.name: Env Sound Wind
Item.description: 100 meter range, creates a cold wind sound effect.

Item.name: Hunger Enabler
Item.description: Place this down to activate the hunger system. Has a 250 meter range.

Item.name: Husk TITAN
Item.description: Summons an extremely dangerous and durable giant husk clad in TITAN armor.

Item.name: Husk Hardsuit (Caustic)
Item.description: Summons a large armored husk that spreads an acid gas when hurt.

Item.name: Husk Hardsuit (Contagious)
Item.description: Summons a large armored husk that can spread a contagious husk gas.

Item.name: Husk
Item.description: Summons two husks.

Item.name: Crawler
Item.description: Summons two crawlers.

Item.name: Mudraptor
Item.description: Summons a mudraptor.

Item.name: Mudraptor Veteran
Item.description: Summons a veteran mudraptor.

Item.name: Nascent Human
Item.description: Summons a Nascent Human, a person who was infected by the Mycor fungus.

Item.name: Abyssal Aerosolizer
Item.description: Summons an Abyssal Aerosolizer, a monster that constantly emits a cursed fog.

Item.name: Abyssal Mimic
Item.description: Summons an Abyssal Mimic, an elusive and transparent monster.

Item.name: Abyssal Savage
Item.description: Summons an Abyssal Savage, a much stronger Nascent.
